name: Scorpio Diadem [1] Blueprint
description: Diadem that symbolizes Scorpio, the eighth of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with topaz.

name: Scorpio Star Aroma
description: The product of the year by Vettel Moura, the 14th president of House Moura, the most famous perfume family of the land, the constellation series is only available during respective month. Muse Moura is a star in his school because he uses different perfume every month. (Use to protect yourself with a constellation symbol that is graceful and stylish. )

name: Scorpio Star Shards
description: An ancient painting passed down for generation in House Laplace, Trillion Stars in a Descending Night Sky depicts the star phantom that is materialized by a goddess to bless people with. (Collect and give it to a goddess and you'll probably receive something nice. )

name: Scout Autumn Bag
description: The exquisite backpack prepared for adventurers who returned back. Anyone who sees this backpack can't help but want to go on an adventure trip!

name: Scutum
description: A bulky shield commonly used in the Middle Ages.

name: Scutum [1]
description: A bulky shield commonly used in the Middle Ages.

name: Sea Sedge Chips
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. LUK ＋ 10, Cri ＋20, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with lucky food)

name: Seabed 1F Material Pack
description: Seabed 1F Material Pack, in which all kinds of Seabed 1F materials can be found.

name: Seabed 2F Material Pack
description: Seabed 2F Material Pack, in which all kinds of Seabed 2F materials can be found.

name: Searing Gift Box
description: Use it and get the Magic Dominator Crimson(male) or Lilith Maiden (female) beauty contact lens from the Beauty of Eyes in Prontera.

name: Seed of Mastela
description: The miraculous shining seed is said to be the seed of a rare fruit. Rumor said that Beru Dandy the Godness planted it at dask, and it had surprisingly grown into a great tree with countless luscious fruits on it on the next morning. Whose yearning could create the miracle like this?

name: Seed of Yggdrasil
description: A leaf of Yggdrasil which created the world. It has a slight aroma and a sweet taste. Restores 50% of HP and SP. During PVP periods, there will be reduced HP Regen. During CD periods, the effect will be greater.

name: Sep. 2017 Gashapon Chest
description: Kafra's special headwear Gashapon toy chest, to express your sincere affection! Open it to receive friend's blessing cards and 10 headwear Gashapon toys relative to 10 months.

name: Sep. 2017 Premium
description: "We will remember this day because we can finally keep pets today! "To appreciate the adventurers who have been supporting us for a long time, the famous Kafra Company specially launched a special small card in the form of a monthly magazine. Hold it and you will feel its magical power. It's practical and highly collectible.
